common.official_website: Official Website of Adv. Anusha – T. Nagar Constituency

home.slogan: Justice for Tamils – Progress for T. Nagar
home.vision_subtitle: A progressive roadmap for T. Nagar constituency, focusing on sustainable development, safety, and empowerment.
home.cta_subtitle: Join us for the change we deserve. Your support is our strength.
home.hero_desc: The law that argues for the rights of common people in courts, will now become the tool that sows change in your constituency!
home.candidate_desc: With over 10 years of experience as an advocate in the Madras High Court, I have been consistently raising my voice for the rights of the common people. Realizing the need for social and political transformation, I have now entered the electoral field as your constituency candidate on behalf of Naam Tamilar Katchi.
home.vision_card_youth_desc: Skill development and technology centers for local youth.

about.title: About Adv. Anusha
about.education_desc: Completed B.A. L.L.B (Hons) from prestigious law university, specialized in Constitutional Law.
about.legal_exp_desc: 10+ years of active practice in Madras High Court, advocating for human rights and common labor issues.
about.social_service_desc: Actively involved in free legal aid for marginalized communities and fighting for social justice.
about.political_journey_desc: Representing the noble goals of Naam Tamilar Katchi and Tamil National politics under the leadership of Seeman.
about.vision_tnagar_desc: Committed to making T. Nagar a model constituency with world-class infrastructure and safety.
about.banner_title: Advocate Anusha - Legal Activist & Public Servant
about.banner_subtitle: Law in the courtroom, people's rights on the streets – Before you as the candidate of Naam Tamilar Katchi!
about.public_life_desc: I believe that law is not just words on paper, but a tool that protects the livelihood of ordinary people. Speaking for the marginalized, ensuring women's safety, and providing proper guidance to the youth form the foundation of my public life.
about.ntk_candidate_heading: As a Naam Tamilar Katchi Candidate...
about.ntk_candidate_desc: Tamil National politics is the politics of reclaiming the rights of our race. Inspired by the noble principles of leader Seeman, I stand before you today as the constituency candidate on behalf of Naam Tamilar Katchi. Contesting under the 'Farmer' symbol of NTK is a proud moment in my life.
about.quote: All towns are our town, all people are our kin – The ethics of Tamils is our politics!
about.quote_english: The Ethics of Tamils is Our Politics

vision.title: Our Vision & Mission
vision.subtitle: Our action plan to transform T. Nagar constituency into a model constituency with a self-sustaining economy and green cover.
vision.card_env_desc: Priority will be given to protecting the environment of T. Nagar, restoring temple tanks and water bodies to raise groundwater levels.
vision.card_infra_desc: Road and drainage projects will be implemented with decentralization and public participation to ensure transparency in governance.
vision.card_safety_desc: Modern surveillance and rapid action teams will be set up across the constituency to ensure the safety of women, children, and the elderly.
vision.card_traders_desc: Dedicated sales zones and simplified licensing will be created to protect small traders from corporate dominance.
vision.card_youth_desc: Priority in factories and modern technology training will be provided to ensure employment opportunities for local youth.
vision.card_water_desc: Purified safe drinking water will be ensured to reach all households at all times.
vision.feature_title: Change is not just a word, it is our action!
vision.feature_desc: We aim to transform T. Nagar into a place where every citizen feels safe, empowered, and proud.
vision.feature_list_1: Priority for local residents in constituency development.
vision.feature_list_2: Transparent fund allocation and open audit.
vision.feature_list_3: Community participation in every key decision.
vision.assembly_desc: We will establish a monthly 'Constituency Assembly' where residents can directly raise their grievances and vote on priority projects for their streets and neighborhoods.

manifesto.banner_subtitle: Our election promises for T. Nagar constituency. Let's build a new nation!
manifesto.cat1_item1: Complete transparency in constituency development fund.
manifesto.cat1_item2: Monthly public assembly to address grievances.
manifesto.cat1_item3: Digital monitoring to prevent corruption in government services.
manifesto.cat2_item1: Government primary health centers with modern facilities.
manifesto.cat2_item2: Mobile medical vehicle service for senior citizens.
manifesto.cat2_item3: Clean environment and dengue prevention measures across the constituency.
manifesto.cat2_item4: Ensuring government welfare schemes reach disadvantaged families directly.
manifesto.cat3_item1: Upgrading government schools with smart classrooms.
manifesto.cat3_item2: Free coaching centers for competitive exams (TNPSC, UPSC).
manifesto.cat3_item3: Employment priority for local youth in T. Nagar business establishments.
manifesto.cat3_item4: Loan assistance and marketing support for tailoring and small businesses.
manifesto.cat4_item1: Removing water body encroachments to make T. Nagar a flood-free zone.
manifesto.cat4_item2: Modern technology in solid waste management and composting.
manifesto.cat4_item3: Creating a plastic-free T. Nagar and increasing green cover.
manifesto.cat4_item4: Venue for traditional Tamil arts and cultural events.
manifesto.cta_desc: We believe in accountability. This manifesto is not a mere paper but a social contract between us and you.

contact.banner_subtitle: Share your thoughts and support with us.

volunteer.why_join_desc: We are fighting for honest political change. Whether it's fieldwork, social media campaigns, or public relations, you can join us and contribute according to your interest.
volunteer.fieldwork_desc: Meeting people directly and explaining our policies.
volunteer.media_desc: Spreading the voice of change through social media platforms.
volunteer.label_how_help: How would you like to help?
